name: 3d battleroyale
description:
TESTERS WANTED - Fame and glory is waiting for you!

Brutal Strike
- The new game from the creator of CSP! Features high quality graphics and several game modes: Classic, Co-op, Sniper and Battle Royale. - Game is still under development, but already available to players who want to try it out.

How can I test?
- Join Discord server at https://discord.gg/Y7YzyWr
- Access #brutal-strike channel and download PC or Android version.
- Don't forget to enable "tester" role on this server by accessing the channel by typing secret phase: .iam private tester

What does a tester do?
- Play a lot and send to developer feedback regarding any problems or improvement suggestions

How to send feedback?
- Send details to @phaneron on #private-tester channel
- It's important to share as much information as possible, such as the description of the problem, steps to reproduce it, screenshot (or video), FPS and error log

Get involved in this project and contribute to the game development!
